faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the client limit work?
faq.a1: The client limit refers to the number of active client profiles you can manage in the system. You can archive inactive clients to free up space.
faq.q2: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.a2: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.q3: Is there a contract or commitment period?
faq.a3: All plans are billed monthly with no long-term commitment. You can cancel at any time.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept all major credit cards, as well as PayPal for your convenience.
faq.q5: Do you offer a free trial?
faq.a5: Yes, new consultants can try the Growth plan free for 14 days, no credit card required.
